title: my honest recommendation
text:
i‚Äôve been editing with capcut for a good while, but im lacking some stuff in the capcut app, this is just a PLEASE add this to your app if you can!

1: graphs
i‚Äôve been doing some edits on the app. safe to say, its really easy to make edits and super fun with all the effects, filters, keyframes, etc. but, making an edit with only keyframes is way too hard. a simple transition can take up to an hour to succeed with no graphs. please, add graphs.

2: overlay limit
when i make edits or try animating with characters, the overlay limit can make me miss a leg or any other body part. i recommend to make the overlay limit unlimited since its way too hard having to keep exporting and all that and eventually having to use another program.

3: the lag
there‚Äôs an intense amount of lag if you add a few effects, overlays, or simple texts. and i‚Äôd really love if you fix the issue

4: off timing
i‚Äôve had this issue editing for someone a video with only subtitles, the subtitles would be on time in the app but out of the app its off time (slightly) and its very confusing. please fix this.

that‚Äôs all, thank you!

title: Suggestions..
text:
I just request a dark mode for sensitive eyes such as mine, or any late night editors; if there is a dark mode, I haven‚Äôt seen it.

Edit: there‚Äôs two REALLY annoying bugs
1. When scrolling through templates, sometimes the audio from the last one will play over the next ones. It also freezes the next templates.
2. If you don‚Äôt pause a template before you use it, the two audios (one from the template-preview and one from using the template while editing it) will just play over each other making it really annoying. You have to close out the template and click pause on the template-preview, and then go back to using the template.

title: Mixed Feelings

I‚Äôm a theater kid so it‚Äôs my job to be dramatic and I was furious I then scrolled to see that they were making things that were from the pro feature before pro. title: Great except one MAJOR flaw/glitch??
text: I‚Äôve been using capcut for about a year now and usually rave about it, but the last month has been torture due to the play button and the delete button no longer being responsive when using my keyboard. Typically, the space bar will play/pause the video, but all of a sudden it stopped working. At first I thought my keyboard was broken, but then I noticed that when using other apps on my iPad, the buttons worked just fine. I also connected a different Bluetooth keyboard and was met with the same problems. I did a google search and found a few people with the same problem in capcut, but no solutions. Seems like some sort of glitch and I‚Äôm hopeful an update may correct it, but its very frustrating as it makes the editing process much less efficient. Aside from that the app works well.

title: Would definitely recommend
text:
I love this app, it‚Äôs very helpful when I need to edit something, it has a lot of features, it‚Äôs not that hard to learn, it has good graphics, and most things are free if you don‚Äôt want to pay for pro, one flaw tho, you can‚Äôt layer more than 7 overlays, that makes it kinda hard to edit, especially if you are trying to edit a human with many different body parts, the only way for me to be able to edit character is to have all the main body parts in different creations so you have enough room for all the body parts. title: Good! But..
text:
CapCut is my #1 fav app! It is the best app and a great experience! All the transitions are very cool and the stickers are amazing! You can even extract an audio FROM your video, which I like, and it‚Äôs a great app overall!

All though it is a great app, here are a few suggestions:
For audio editing, I feel like you guys can make it even better by creating a little icon that lets you create 8D audio, which makes the audio echo in a smooth and a clear way. What you can also do is add ‚Äúrealistic‚Äù sound effects. When I say that, I mean like in audio edits, it has a little sound effect that makes noises such as an echo laughter, etc.(Sorry if that doesn‚Äôt make sense) :‚Äô)

For transitions, you can add a different icon that says ‚ÄúTransition Effects‚Äù. This icon can have things such as oscillate! And with that, I feel like CapCut can be an even greater app!

Now, one last suggestion: 
For the text, maybe try and make text fonts that are much more unique.

Anyways, those are some of the suggestions I would like for your next update in the future. That is, of course if you get a new update.

title: Amazing and simple but I want two things to be added and revamped.

But overall very good and thanks to the CapCut team for working hard on their updates. The app is amazing.

title: A good place to start
text: I‚Äôve been a user for almost two years now, and I have to give credit where credit is due‚Äî CapCut is easy to use and great for video creators who aren‚Äôt very advanced yet. Even better, you don‚Äôt have a watermark to worry about, since you can delete the one at the end. Lots of features have been added since I started using the app, and I have to say, they‚Äôre good improvements‚Ä¶ well, all except the new ‚ÄúCapCut Pro‚Äù addition. The best thing about CapCut used to be that it was completely free and you didn‚Äôt have to pay any money to access the features; and the tradeoff was having fewer effects overall. The Pro-Plan cost is outrageous. If you‚Äôre considering buying it because you want to level up your video-editing skills, don‚Äôt. Go learn Alight Motion instead.

title: my review
text: I honestly love capcut. It's one of the simplest editing apps to use, and there are lots of things that you can do with it. However, there is one big thing that is quite a big problem at the moment. That problem being that I cannot export nor edit one of my longer videos at all as the app crashes completely. This is really irritating as of course there was quite a lot of effort that was put into the project and now I cannot access it anymore. I hope in the future that this problem doesnt occur, or that there is a way to export most or all of the video without it crashing. For example when you select a video in the menu area, it also gives the choice of exporting it then and there.

title: Good but it has MAJOR problems
text: This app is good, mostly because it‚Äôs free and stuff. And you can basically do whatever you want on here. But here are my problems. As you know, most people on TikTok use this app to edit for their edit accounts. But, as I see i‚Äôm better apps, such as VideoStar, they have all these cool effects and stuff that people on Capcut don‚Äôt get. Not to mention some of the buttons working in and out at random times. I had to reverse a clip for an edit but it did not reverse and told me to ‚Äútry again‚Äù. I did and it didn‚Äôt work. I had to re-download the WHOLE app entirely over this glitch. And other buttons don‚Äôt work as well, either. Please fix this lr I promise you, people will just pay the short amount it is for VideoStar and other apps like AE and will not use this platform to edit. <3

title: Great but‚Ä¶
text: This is the best editing app and I‚Äôm so happy with how many effects there are for me to use on my YT videos this is definitely an all in one editor. I just wish that when I was adding effects that I could split the effect bars bc sometimes I want to put the same effect split up into multiple different parts very close together and I hate having to go all the way back in the effects and scroll through to pick it again. I just wish we could cut and extend effects. I hope someone who created this app sees this and make an update to allow this feature. People love ease of access and not stuff that is difficult. I love this app and it‚Äôs amazing that‚Äôs its free 9.5/10

title: Best Editing App!
text: This is by far, the best editing app that I have come across. I would like to suggest some features for the upcoming update. Shadows and strokes for overlays, speed for text, more animations for text and possibly animations for overlays. (For ex. a softer shake loop animation, jiggle loop animation but instead horizontally or both or all directions) possibly more shaking effects or jiggle effects for the actual video footage(again, possibly multiple directions). I would like speed for keyframes, (and a way to control the speed and see the speed). Also, is there a way for you to be able to add an in animation, a loop animation, and an out animation for text at the same time? Last, please add a feature where you can add your own text.

title: AWSOME!!!
text: CapCut is so good everything about it is so good but I hate pro. Pro is really annoying and I can‚Äôt do the hood edits I have in mind bc of pro. Anyways no one cares abt that. title: Adore this - just one quick request
text:
This app is my go-to for editing. It‚Äôs straightforward to use, reliable for different types of videos, and overall just so engaging and fun. 100% worth checking out. Favorite editing app I‚Äôve ever used, and I‚Äôm so appreciative that it‚Äôs free. 

My only request is to please allow a ‚Äòchange for all‚Äô option when it comes to text styles. Like when I change the spacing between words, I would love to have the option to do it for all the text in my video and to continue with this format for the next text, similar to what happens when I pick a font/size. If that option could be added, that would be AMAZING! 

Thank you :)

title: Obviously not perfect but great!
text: So no app is perfect and I wasn't expecting this one to be, obviously. My expectations were high and the app totally matched them! Sometimes it's hard to understand how to do everything since there are so many tools and buttons but once you get the hang of it and learn how to use it, you can be like a pro! The only reason why I do not give five stars for this app is because there are a few little tweeks that could be fixed like how there is not that large of varietys for certain effects but I'm sure Cap Cut team is working on it. It is rare for me to leave good reviews such as four or even five stars so this rating definitely means something. Thank you for reading this paragraph and have a nice day.

title: Amazing but my storage..
text: Now I have to say myself, this app has helped me out a lot and I‚Äôve mastered almost everything in this app. I have loved these new updates coming out! The only thing that‚Äôs making me concerned is that it always says that my storage is full. Now understand that my device is old, and that makes sense (but I only have 5 or 6 apps right now, and 3 of them I need to download again because I haven‚Äôt used them). So that should be about 2 or 3 apps only, I may have a lot of photos but my settings says apps are the most. So I‚Äôm thinking CapCut is taking up some of my storage, but of course I love this app and it does practically everything every other app does. I hope people see this because I would like to know if it‚Äôs just me or if it‚Äôs other people too! I LOVE THIS APP THOUGH!!

title: One bug
text: Hello! Never really make reviews so I apologize in advance if what I‚Äôm saying is either vague or not specific üòÖ.  The app, overall my favorite. It‚Äôs very quick and easy to use and I‚Äôve been using it for a couple months. Since the recent update though, there‚Äôs been a bug that I rely on. One being the stickers. They don‚Äôt seem to load, as for the transitions do the same. Whenever I tap on a grey square (what the sticker icons look like) sometime it would load the ones I‚Äôve previously put in a clip, but not the ones that I haven‚Äôt. They show up saying that I need to check my connection. I deleted and reinstalled the app and that didn‚Äôt do anything but lose clips :/. Thanks if you are reading this!

title: This is incredible
text: I‚Äôve had this app for about a year now and I must say, this is BEYOND incredible. The presets are very useful, and effects are marvelous as well! The fact that you can remove the watermark FOR FREE is such an amazing feature; I never have to worry about missing out on anything because I can‚Äôt pay for it but instead all is free! I love the templates that they include as well! I feel as if it is so simple for me to get around and find out new things! You can completely animate anything with the presets and key frames (which comes very handy when feeling a little creative)! I don‚Äôt find myself changing apps anytime soon! In my opinion this is the best editing app for beginner editors and EVEN pro editors! This is definitely an underrated app.

title: BEST EDITING APP.
text: It may seem like CapCut is not that exciting and you just try different modes of stuff, but it is AWESOME. You can extract any sound or audio that you have, or use other sounds. You can add your own images and videos, and there are loads of filters, and effects, and it‚Äôs fun to be silly and play around with them. On CapCut you can even share your own videos and people can make their version of them. This is called using a ‚ÄúTemplate‚Äù for beginners if you think your editing skills aren‚Äôt that great YET, you can use a template as a base that someone else made, and you can add your own photos and videos, and texts. If you are looking for an editing app GET CAPCUT, DOWNLOAD NOW.

title: The only editing app you will need!!
text: I love cap cut more than any of my editing apps!! It‚Äôs so easy to make edits of my favorite shows,my friends,family,dogs,movies and etc.. I could spend hours just scrolling through. Why I love this app so much is because it already has templates to make your edits and it feels like you made a masterpiece after making it!! Cap cut has a tutorial section where they show you how to edit better, so if you wanted to edit a video or make a edit then you can go to the tutorial part and it will show exactly how to use it. Overall the app in my opinion has no flaws and is my favorite thing to do on my device!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

title: capcut is great, but‚Ä¶
text: capcut is a great app, and has literally everything that i need to edit my videos. smooth animations, perfect transition, and just amazing effects. but, sometimes it says that i have no wifi, when i literally have full bars, and it‚Äôs not slow, and when that happens, it doesn‚Äôt let me edit anything. restarting your router doesn‚Äôt even work. the only solution is to delete the app, and redownload it. but it DOES NOT SAVE YOUR DATA. thankfully i had saved my videos in my camera, so i just put them in again, but it does not let you edit them again. i find this very annoying, so if you could please fix this? as i‚Äôm typing, i have a full bar, and capcut is saying that i have no internet connection so now i have to do that thing again. PLEASE FIX THIS üôèüôè
